blog.name: vampiric-plays-games
blog.title: VampiricYoshi
blog.description:
Vampiric Yoshi's Gaming Blog!
Games featured rated up to M/18+. This blog may contain some difficult themes in context with The games that are featured. Reader discretion is advised. I will tag things with different themes as necessary; Feel free to suggest any tags.
Primary blog is Ask-KittySpya  (mistakes were made). Messages from them are from me.
+Under Construction+

summary:
He's a World-Class Detective

 Please do not remove artist comment. 

I want to see this movie. I'll probably see it with my...
caption:
He’s a World-Class Detective

Please do not remove artist comment.

I want to see this movie. I’ll probably see it with my siblings when it comes out :) I haven’t played the game though - I should probably do that too. XD

Based on this Vine (warning for language)

The products Pikachu has are Mammo Tracks (based on Mammoswine and Moose Tracks ice cream), Caffine Berry Grounds, and Moo-Moo Ice Cream (based on the item Moo-Moo Milk).

(Links and disclaimer under cut)

DeviantART Link
Twitter Link

–

Pokemon © the Pokemon Company
Vine joke by Matt Post
Art by me - please do not repost without permission.

summary: Please tell me I'm not the only one
body:
Please tell me I’m not the only one

Me: i want to see detective Pikachu! :D

Friend that knows how distant I am with pop culture: do you even know who Pikachu is?

Me: the yellow rat? :/

Friend: *sigh* have you ever seen Pokemon the series?

Me: no

Friend: ever played the games?

Me:… No ._.)

Friend: do you know any other Pokemon besides Pikachu?

Me:…. no :v

Friend: -_-)….

Me: I’ll still watch the movie! >:D

Friend: go ahead -_-)👍

“What do you...

summary: La película Pokémon: Detective Pikachu estrena nuevo tráiler: "No Clue"
title: La película Pokémon: Detective Pikachu estrena nuevo tráiler: "No Clue"
body:
Desde Warner Bros. Pictures han compartido un nuevo tráiler de Pokémon: Detective Pikachu, la película de imagen real inspirada por el juego del mismo nombre lanzado en Nintendo 3DS. 

Desde Warner Bros. Pictures han compartido un nuevo tráiler de Pokémon: Detective Pikachu, la película de imagen real inspirada por el juego del mismo nombre lanzado en Nintendo 3DS.

La película se estrenará el próximo 10 de mayo en Estados Unidos, llegando el 17 de mayo a otras partes del mundo.

Rob Letterman (El Espantatiburones, Pesadillas) será el director del filme, quien contará con guion de

summary: Would it be rude to request again? Red looking confused while holding Detective Pikachu?
question: Would it be rude to request again? Red looking confused while holding Detective Pikachu?
answer:
Of course not! You’re welcome to send as many as you like!! I get to draw Red so it’s just as fun for me.

This is exactly what imagined when I first read this prompt and I haven’t been able to rest until I’ve drawn it.

reblog.comment:
Of course not! You’re welcome to send as many as you like!! I get to draw Red so it’s just as fun for me.

This is exactly what imagined when I first read this prompt and I haven’t been able to rest until I’ve drawn it.

trail.content_raw:
Of course not! You’re welcome to send as many as you like!! I get to draw Red so it’s just as fun for me.

This is exactly what imagined when I first read this prompt and I haven’t been able to rest until I’ve drawn it.
trail.content:
